PATH_COVERAGE.name: Path
PATH_COVERAGE.description: Every path defined in the OpenAPI specification has been called. This is a subset of `HTTP_METHOD_COVERAGE`.

HTTP_METHOD_COVERAGE.name: HTTP Method
HTTP_METHOD_COVERAGE.description: Each HTTP method (`GET`, `POST`, `PUT`, `DELETE`, etc.) for each path has been tested.

ERROR_RESPONSE_CODE_COVERAGE.name: Error Response Code
ERROR_RESPONSE_CODE_COVERAGE.description: Each documented error response code for each endpoint is tested. This is a subset of `RESPONSE_CODE_COVERAGE`.

RESPONSE_CODE_COVERAGE.name: Response Code
RESPONSE_CODE_COVERAGE.description: Each documented response code for each endpoint is tested.

REQUIRED_PARAMETER_COVERAGE.name: Required Parameter
REQUIRED_PARAMETER_COVERAGE.description: Each required parameter (in path, query) has been tested with valid values. This is a subset of `PARAMETER_COVERAGE`.

PARAMETER_COVERAGE.name: Parameter
PARAMETER_COVERAGE.description: Each parameter (in path, query) has been tested with valid values.

REQUIRED_ERROR_FIELDS_COVERAGE.name: Required Error Fields
REQUIRED_ERROR_FIELDS_COVERAGE.description: Error responses include all required fields.

ALL_RESPONSE_CODES_DOCUMENTED_COVERAGE.name: All Response Codes Documented
ALL_RESPONSE_CODES_DOCUMENTED_COVERAGE.description: All response codes (including errors) that occurred must be documented in the OpenAPI specification.

ALL_ERROR_CODES_DOCUMENTED_COVERAGE.name: All Error Codes Documented
ALL_ERROR_CODES_DOCUMENTED_COVERAGE.description: All error response codes that occurred must be documented in the OpenAPI specification. This is a subset of `ALL_RESPONSE_CODES_DOCUMENTED_COVERAGE`.

ALL_NON_ERROR_CODES_DOCUMENTED_COVERAGE.name: All Error Codes Documented
ALL_NON_ERROR_CODES_DOCUMENTED_COVERAGE.description: All response codes that occurred and are not being considered errors (0 - 399) must be documented in the OpenAPI specification. This is a subset of `ALL_RESPONSE_CODES_DOCUMENTED_COVERAGE`.
